ModMetaData.name: Quality Of Building
ModMetaData.author: sdknm2
ModMetaData.description: Original: Different texture for different Quality to buildings Forked by Ð¯e6al Fork author: Quality dependant textures make diversity without bloating and breaking balance. All those "Weapons" mods ARE duplicating items already present, actually breaking the game balance. This mod adds original textures, and Textures from other mods to make visual recognition of objects instant, not bloating and not adding any similar items. Now you dont need a mod which adds 5 versions of the same gun, but one gun will look as different based on its quality.
